name: Cooked fresh figs
description: The preparation may be done several hours in advance, then completed at the last minute.
keywords: butter, figs, dessert, side dish, fall, summer

recipeInstructions.text: Wash figs, blanch in boiling water for 30 seconds, rinse with cold water and carefully peel. Ten minutes before serving, saute gently in butter until heated through.
To serve, arrange several figs on each plate, surrounding the sauced su-premes.
